means: （人或机器）倔强的，不听使唤的

sentence.Network_en: The balky engine sputtered and stopped.
sentence.Network_cn: 不听使唤的发动机劈啪作响地停了下来。

sentence.Network_en: More and more he admired Franklin Roosevelt's ability to drive this balky team.
sentence.Network_cn: 他越来越钦佩弗兰克林·罗斯福驾驭这套总是停蹄不前的马车的本领.

sentence.Network_en: They'll also get Chris Mihm back shortly from his lengthy bout with a balky ankle.
sentence.Network_cn: 在不久的未来,湖人还将迎来许久因膝伤缺席的米姆.
